subject: PE Today: "Maverick" No More McCain
body:
CBSNews.com












McCain's 
      Straight Talk StallsWant to be president? Don't 
      get on the wrong side of big business. That's the lesson that comes 
      out of today's New York Times story on John 
      McCain, whose two presidential campaigns are shaping up to be a depressing 
      cautionary tale in the limits of "straight talk" campaigning.[+ Read More]

Fox's 
      Follow Through?When 
      Fox "Sunday Morning" host Chris Wallace introduced Commander of U.S. 
      Forces in Iraq General Petraeus, he set the agenda for the discussion -- 
      including a critical piece in the New Yorker where a former Army general 
      criticized Pentagon leadership.  But over the course of his 
      interview, he never returned to this topic. Why?[+ Read More]

Ombudsmania!Public 
      Eye continues its look at the issues at play in Print 
      MediaLand through the eyes of its 
      ombudsmen.  This week’s piping hot batch of columns dealt 
      with numerous serious and 
      weighty journalistic 
      topics -- race, ethics, death 
      and objectivity were among the issues discussed.[+ Read More]
